name: TableColumnCollection
description: Represents a collection of all the columns that are part of the table.

info.title: Office JavaScript Add-in API
info.description: Office JavaScript Add-in API for June fork

properties.name: count
properties.description: Returns the number of columns in the table.

methods.name: getItem
methods.description: Gets a column object by Name or ID.

methods.name: getItemAt
methods.description: Gets a column based on its position in the collection.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Index value of the object to be retrieved. Zero-indexed.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new column to the table.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Specifies the relative position of the new column. The previous column at this position is shifted to the right. The index value should be equal to or less than the last column's index value, so it cannot be used to append a column at the end of the table. Zero-indexed.

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: A 2-dimensional array of unformatted values of the table column.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
